divs: Sighting Details I was on Ship Island, Ms. for a picnic. It was a clear day and I was with my wife. I was taking scenic pictures from under a covered decking. I never heard any other picnickers mentioning anything in the sky. It was on June 26th, 2010 (two weeks later) that I noticed something. While gazing at my picture I noticed something out of the ordinary. When I zoomed in I could see a triangle shaped object and a circular object in very close proximity to each other (it looks like they are practically touching from the angle of the photo). A second picture I have also shows something but not as discernable as the first. About the picture: I was using a Fujitsu digital Camera.I believe the settings were at 5 megapixel and I was slightly zoomed in when taking the picture. Near the upper center of the picture and above a very green pointy bush you'll see what appears to be a speck or something. If you zoom in you will see the shapes I describe. I think its fantastic that an innocent scenic picture turned out a possible UFO!
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Gulfport
There were no other sightings in Gulfport on or around June 12th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Ship Island scenic picture. Didn't see UFO on the day. I saw the UFO a week later when reviewing picture!
